title: HBO Max Isn't TVâ€”It's Movie Paradise. Here Are 25 You Should Watch.
description:
The launch of HBO Max means a new entrant in the streaming TV wars. But the big winners might be movie fans. HBO Max's catalog is one of the deepest we've seen. Sean picks a few favorites to start (1:15). Then he's joined by Kirby Dick and Amy Ziering to discuss their new film, 'On the Record,' which can be found on the service (30:24).
Host: Sean Fennessey
Guests: Kirby Dick and Amy Ziering
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
